name: Captain Mod Terrik
Lore: 'Leader. Captain Mod Terrik, a typical officer of the Desert Sands sandtrooper unit. Fearless and highly motivated. Willing to sacrifice as many troops as necessary.',
Text: 'Other sandtroopers are deploy -1. Your ability-1 troopers may not have their forfeit reduced and (unless they have another forfeit bonus) are forfeit +2. At sites where you have two troopers, they may draw one battle destiny if not able to otherwise.',
